releaseNotes:
## BOB Productivity Platform 3.8.6

### 🚀 Features & Improvements
- CI/Deploy: add workflows; version alignment gate; update deploy script for build version; no app code changes
- 🔧 v3.8.8: Goals Page Timestamp Fix - ModernGoalsTable Story Loading
- ✨ v3.8.7: Enhanced TaskListView - Route Redirect, Sprint Selector, Card/Table Views
- 🚨 URGENT FIX: Issue #92 - Critical Firestore Index + React Timestamp Error Resolution
- 🔧 v3.8.6 Goals Page React Error #31 Fix - DEPLOYED
- 🔧 Fix React Error #31 in Goals Components - Restore Working State
- ✅ v3.8.6 Comprehensive React Error #31 & Cache Busting Resolution
- ✅ v3.8.6 Dashboard Timestamp Fixes - React Error #31 Resolution
- 🔧 Clean up Firebase indexes - Remove duplicates and conflicts
- 📦 Update version to v3.8.6 and add Firebase composite indexes

### 🐛 Issues Resolved
- #85: 🐛 Fix React Error #31: Firestore Timestamp Serialization Issues
- #78: Critical: Sign Out Button Disappears in Dark Mode - Theme Consistency Issue
- #39: Crisis management
- #38: Situational awareness
- #37: Strategic planning

### 📈 Technical Details
- Version: 3.8.6
- Build Date: 2025-09-07T13:17:55Z
- Deployment: Firebase Hosting
- Repository: zulumonkeymetallic/bob
githubIssues: #Cache Loop - Fixed infinite cache clearing preventing login
#Login Issues - Resolved cache busting loop conflicts
#Production Stability - Enhanced cache management safety

releaseNotes:
## BOB Productivity Platform 3.8.6

### 🚀 Features & Improvements
- feat(goals): unify editing via EditGoalModal for cards and ModernGoalsTable; add start/end dates for planning; feat(context): add SprintContext and global SprintSelector wiring
- feat(ui): add global SprintSelector to mobile header and desktop toolbar; switch goals timeline/roadmap to EnhancedGanttChart
- style(sidebar): use theme gray for theme chain text in light mode via var(--notion-text-gray)
- chore(build): fix isolatedModules by marking placeholder files as modules; add SKIP_TESTS support to deploy script
- chore(version): align public/version.json to 3.8.6 for deployment
- v3.8.6: Comprehensive Goals debugging with extensive timestamp handling
- CI/CD: add GitHub Actions (CI + Deploy) using FIREBASE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT; version alignment check; version sync hooks; Goals timestamp fix; version badge (#101)
- 🔧 v3.8.8: Goals Page Timestamp Fix - ModernGoalsTable Story Loading

### 🐛 Issues Resolved
- #85: 🐛 Fix React Error #31: Firestore Timestamp Serialization Issues
- #78: Critical: Sign Out Button Disappears in Dark Mode - Theme Consistency Issue
- #39: Crisis management
- #38: Situational awareness
- #37: Strategic planning

### 📈 Technical Details
- Version: 3.8.6
- Build Date: 2025-09-07T15:07:55Z
- Deployment: Firebase Hosting
- Repository: zulumonkeymetallic/bob
